actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, and Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To reauthorize the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000.
short_title: Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Reauthorization Act of 2007

summary.text: Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Reauthorization Act of 2007 - Amends the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000 to extend the Act through FY2007.
